scripts.start-prod: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js production exec "pm2 start deployment.config.js"
scripts.stop-prod: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js production exec "pm2 stop deployment.config.js"
scripts.logs-prod: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js production exec "pm2 logs aria-telegram-bot-production --lines 10000"
scripts.error-logs-prod: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js production exec "pm2 logs aria-telegram-bot-production --err --lines 2000"
scripts.start-qa: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js qa exec "pm2 start deployment.config.js"
scripts.stop-qa: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js qa exec "pm2 stop deployment.config.js"
scripts.logs-qa: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js qa exec "pm2 logs aria-telegram-bot-qa --lines 2000"
scripts.error-logs-qa: pm2 deploy deployment.config.js qa exec "pm2 logs aria-telegram-bot-qa --err --lines 2000"
